title: The most obnoxious type of player
body:
After you say: Dude, just play safe how hard can it be to just jump out of hooks, you're xxxx(dont want to expose their identity )
Them after I say it: Muted

Later on: Dude it's not that hard bro, etc etc. All you have to do is xxxx. 
Them: Omg this guy is toxic af plz report.

Legit they are like little babies, high self-esteem can lead to bad things.

replies.body: Some people just don't want help. I've found it's best to just ignore these players if they're gonna have an attitude with you when you're trying to help.

The most obnoxious sort of player are the pathetic brats that spam you with friend requests so they can rage about your mother.

Children with anger issues that bad allowed to use the internet, they just hurt themselves. Poor parenting in action.

incorrect, I am the most obnoxious form of player. after every death if I've tilted I comment on the cause of my death such as "why does kassadin get free flashes" or "why do zac blobs take so much true damage" getting progressively more and more toxic as the game goes.

I pretty much say to myself don't talk while I'm dead, it helps.
